channel.title: Npc Drops. [317] Delta
channel.description:
Hello, when I go into the "Npcdrops.java" I cannot add a single thing into that file without getting the same error every time. Even if I copy an exact line, I continue getting the error, this is making it impossible for me to add any other drops to my npcs. I don't know what's causing this but... here is the error.
Please note: This is not a compile error (It compiles fine, without error) The error I get happens when I try and run the server...
[img]http://i52.tinypic.com/kf3acp.png[/img]

item.title: Npc Drops. [317] Delta
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

I’ll just quote one of my other posts:

NPCHandler only allows 15 drops per NPC. To edit that look in NPCHandler for:

And change that 45 to something like 300 (for 100 drops per npc).

Offtopic: This is the thirteenth time I’ve posted this solution. USE THE SEARCH BUTTON.

Fourteenth now.

Read full topic
